titles.title: Town of North Topsail Beach Coastal Barrier Resources System Map Amendment
Town of North Topsail Beach Coastal Barrier Resources System Map Amendment
To revise the boundaries of a unit of the John H. Chafee Coastal Barrier Resources System in Topsail, North Carolina, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Water, Wildlife, and Fisheries.
Subcommittee on Water, Wildlife, and Fisheries Discharged
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held
Ordered to be Reported in the Nature of a Substitute (Amended) by the Yeas and Nays: 19 - 15.
Reported (Amended) by the Committee on Natural Resources. H. Rept. 118-720.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 608.

committee.name: House Natural Resources
committee.activity: Reported By, Markup By, Discharged, Referred To

bill.summary: This bill modifies certain boundaries of the John H. Chafee Coastal Barrier Resources System Unit located in North Topsail Beach, North Carolina.
